attributes.comment:
If it is necessary to raise the charge for fingerprints & immigration forms that is
fine. But please wait until the end of 2007/early 2008 so that families that are
adopting from China can completed adoptions that began in 2006. The costs of
submitting for fingerprints & immigration paperwork work two times due to the long
wait from China is a burden for myself and other families. To raise the cost now
will add additional financial difficulties to an already expensive and complicated
process. Please allow us to adopt our daughter without adding on an additional
expense. Raising fees at this time could really prevent an orphan from having a
safe and loving home. Please do not raise the cost for families that are already in
the process of adopting and who are renewing paperwork and fingerprints for the
second time. We would like to achieve our goal of FAMILY. Thank you for your
consideration regarding this matter.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Theresa A. Daniels
